DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect steady-state concentration odalasvir ( ODV ) , AL-335 combination 3-direct-acting anti-viral agent ( 3-DAA ) ODV , AL-335 , simeprevir ( SMV ) single-dose pharmacokinetic ( PK ) drospirenone ethinylestradiol healthy female participant .
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Effects Odalasvir AL-335 With Simeprevir Single-Dose Pharmacokinetics Ethinylestradiol Drospirenone Healthy Female Participants
DOC.criteria: Participant must female childbearing potential normal menstrual cycle Participant must body mass index ( BMI ; weight kg divide square height meter ) 18.0 30.0 kilogram per square meter ( kg/m^2 ) , extremes include , body weight less 50.0 kilogram ( kg ) Participant must blood pressure ( participant supine 5 minute ) 90 140 millimeter mercury ( mmHg ) systolic , inclusive , high 90 mmHg diastolic . If blood pressure range , 2 repeat assessment permit Participant must negative serum ( beta human chorionic gonadotropin [ beta hCG ] ) pregnancy test screen Participant must negative highly sensitive urine pregnancy test Day 1 Participant peri postmenopausal , participant bilateral oophorectomia Participant history hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) hepatitis C antibody ( antiHCV ) positive , clinically active liver disease , test positive HBsAg antiHCV screen Participant previously dose simeprevir ( SMV ) , odalasvir ( ODV ) , AL335 3 single dose study , multipledose study SMV , ODV , AL335 Participant currently active gynecological disorder include , limited , vaginal bleeding without obvious reason hyperprolactinemia without galactorrhea Participant past history : heart arrhythmia ( example , extrasystolic rhythms tachycardia rest ) . Isolated extrasystolic beat exclusionary ; risk factor associate Torsade de Pointes hypokalemia ; family history short/long QT syndrome ; sudden unexplained death ( include sudden infant death syndrome [ SIDS ] ) firstdegree relative ( , sibling , offspring , biological parent )
